headline: Ford vs Failure: Will Failure Win Again?
summary: Ford beat earnings estimates in three straight quarters through Q3 2025, with a stunning 367% surprise in Q1. The stock responded by going… nowhere. Up 47% over the past year but still trading at $13.60, barely above where it sat in 2016. That’s the Ford pattern in a nutshell: promise without payoff, execution without escape ...
